LanguageData.CookASUCroquetteBread.label: Bake Croquette Bread x6
LanguageData.CookASUCroquetteBread.description: Bake several rolls of Croquette Bread.
LanguageData.CookASUFriedNoodleSandwich.label: Make Yakisoba Bread x6
LanguageData.CookASUFriedNoodleSandwich.description: Bake several rolls of Yakisoba Bread.
LanguageData.CookASUSweetBeanPasteBun.label: Bake Anpan x6
LanguageData.CookASUSweetBeanPasteBun.description: Bake the Japanese sweet roll, Anpan, and fill it with bean paste.
LanguageData.CookASUCreamBun.label: Bake Cream Bread x6
LanguageData.CookASUCreamBun.description: Bake cream bread with milk/soymilk and eggs.
LanguageData.CookASUChocolateCorne.label: Bake Chococorone x6
LanguageData.CookASUChocolateCorne.description: Bake a "horn" of bread and then stuff it with chocolate.
LanguageData.CookASUMelonpan.label: Bake Melonpan x6
LanguageData.CookASUMelonpan.description: Bake sweet bread and top it with a layer of cookie dough.
LanguageData.CookASUCurryBun.label: Bake Karēpan x6
LanguageData.CookASUCurryBun.description: Take raw dough, stuff it with Japanese curry, cover it with bread crumbs, and then either deep fry or bake it.
